_comment: Command is the command to get the item to the player. **NO / at the start**
_comment1: Chance is the chance to get an item out of 100. Try to keep the entire crate out of 100
_comment2: skull textures can be found from: https://minecraft-heads.com/custom-heads and find the value attribute at the bottom of the head page

1.rewardMsg: - 64 Pieces of Dirt was Rewarded to you

lore: This key can be used with the epic crates
